original_text: It will be very bad for people who think that they are famous because they can drink a lot of wine. They think that they are very brave to mix strong drinks together.
korean_text: 포도주를 마시기에 용감하며 독주를 잘 빚는 자들은 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for people
who think that they are famous
because they can drink a lot of wine
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 포도주를 많이 마실 수 있기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: They think that they are very brave
